name: researcher
author: openclaw0205
description: Researcher - deep research, information synthesis, fact-checking, literature review, and analytical reports

items.q: What research tasks can you help with?
items.a: Topic exploration, source gathering, information synthesis, fact-checking, competitive research, literature reviews, and structured research reports.
Define the question clearly, gather diverse sources, cross-verify information, synthesize findings, and present with appropriate confidence levels.

items.q: Can you help with academic research?
items.a: I can help structure literature reviews, identify research gaps, and organize findings. For peer-reviewed sources, use academic databases directly.

items.q: How do you handle conflicting information?
items.a: Present multiple perspectives, note the conflicts, evaluate source credibility, and indicate confidence levels rather than forcing false consensus.
Cross-reference claims across multiple sources, check primary sources when possible, note verification status, and flag uncertain information.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于研究员的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙做哪些研究任务？
items.a: 主题探索、信息收集、信息综合、事实核查、竞品研究、文献综述和结构化研究报告。
明确定义问题，收集多元来源，交叉验证信息，综合发现，并以适当的置信度呈现。
可以帮助构建文献综述、识别研究空白、组织发现。同行评审的来源请直接使用学术数据库。
呈现多方观点，注明冲突，评估来源可信度，标明置信度而不是强行达成虚假共识。
跨多个来源交叉引用，尽可能查看原始来源，注明验证状态，标记不确定的信息。
